EmailTemplate.name: Year End Savings
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Year End Savings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}.
Where did the year go? Just yesterday we were celebrating the 4th of July and now here comes the New Year. Wow. It just goes faster and faster every year.
At this time of year it's most important for me to stop to say thank you for the trust you've placed in us to support your business. I know {!Account.Name} has high expectations of you and the fact that you trust us to help you achieve your objectives means the world to us. Thank you.
As we close out the year I want you to count on us to squeeze a little extra out of what's left in your budget. If you find you have some dollars you'd like to use this year give me a call. I'm ready to get you special pricing for your end of year projects. Below are a few areas you may want to look to save a few bucks as well as the attached file.
Office Depot Quick Ship Furniture
Office Depot Cleaning & Breakroom
Education Technology Solutions
Healthcare Technology Solutions
What's on your list? Send me what your'e working on and I'll do my best to deliver some savings to cap off a great year.
Thank you again for your trust in 2017 and I look forward to an even better 2018.
Happy Holidays,
Steve Currier
Major Account Manager
774.826.8594 | steve.currier@officedepot.com
